effect_entries.effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its [Attack]{mechanic:attack} raises by one [stage]{mechanic:stage}.
effect_entries.short_effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

effect_entries.effect: Locks the user into this move.  Due to a bug, if this move misses, its [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} drops to 1/256 as long as the user is still locked in.
